page.title: 18Uyeasound Shopping.
page.content: Many people in Uyeasound shop at Harold's.The old folk in the Sheltered Housing need a local shop so they can buy things they need without having to walk too far.The shop opens at 9.30 and closes at 6.00,everyday except Sunday when it does not open at all and Thursday when it closes at 1.00. You can buy everything at this shop. A mobile fish van visits Uyeasound on Tuesdays.It is a new van and most people find this a useful service. If you do not have a car you can take the Overland bus to Lerwick. People occasionally shop in Lerwick where things are cheaper and there is more choice.Going to Lerwick is a full day's outing as it takes at least 2 hours to get there and 2 hours to get back.
